TopicTitle: J-404 Panther Engines / Afterburner Not Producing Thrust

Articles.Content: Sitting on the runway dead still, I have a pair of Panther engines on my plane and if you start (with no brakes on) at full throttle with afterburners on you dont move at all. AeroGUI says it doubles the thrust, but you only start accelerating if you turn off the afterburner
Same issue here!! Did you figure out any workaround? Ideally I'd like to use this engine.
I've even had them produce reverse thrust: https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/1075863855881797804/1078984504213000252/KSP2_x64_hs7X8ulb7N.mp4
